home.title: Home
home.introduction: Hello, I'm Andrew López Herrera. I'm a Computer Engineering student at the Limón Academic Center of the Costa Rica Institute of Technology. This is a professional portfolio designed to showcase my academic and professional activities. Here you will find both technical and soft skills, as well as personal and academic projects.

presentation.title: Biography
presentation.name: Andrew López Herrera
presentation.biography: I am a Computer Engineering student currently studying at the Limón Academic Center of the Costa Rica Institute of Technology. I really like the career I am pursuing; I have always had an affinity for computers, so I didn't hesitate much when entering this field. I consider myself a person who easily adapts to changes, so working in different teams is not a problem for me. Additionally, I am very interested in topics such as compilers and interpreters, artificial intelligence, robotics, and cybersecurity. I tend to lead my teammates to achieve a common goal, although I have no problem having a good leader who also guides me towards an objective.

programmingWorkshop.title: Taller de Programación
programmingWorkshop.description: Certificate for having tutored the Programming Workshop course, taught at the Limón Academic Center of the Costa Rica Institute of Technology during the first semester of 2023.

introductionToProgramming.title: Introducción a la Programación
introductionToProgramming.description: Certificate for having tutored the Introducción a la Programación course, taught at the Limón Academic Center of the Costa Rica Institute of Technology during the first semester of 2023.

computingElements.title: Elementos de Computación
computingElements.description: Certificate for having tutored the Elementos de Computación course, taught at the Limón Academic Center of the Costa Rica Institute of Technology during the first semester of 2024.

attentionToEmotionalAndAcademicNeeds.title: Atención a las Necesidades Emocionales y Académicas
attentionToEmotionalAndAcademicNeeds.description: Certificate for having participated in the training "Attention to Emotional and Academic Needs," taught at the Costa Rica Institute of Technology.
